description:
Rediscover Solitaire and its most popular variations in this timeless classic!
Take a moment to relax with one of 5 variations: Freecell, Golf, Pyramid,
Klondike and Spider, with many more adjustable options for each variation.
Stuck? Use brand new bonuses such as card swap to get yourself out of the situation!
Play a quick game at any time in Free mode or take on 40 increasingly harder challenges in Adventure mode.
name: Best of Board Games - Solitaire
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
